headline: Northrop Grumman Board Declares Quarterly Dividend
summary: FALLS CHURCH, Va., Feb. 18, 2025 -- The board of directors of Northrop Grumman Corporation declared a quarterly dividend of $2.06 per share on Northrop Grumman common stock, payable March 19,...
